title: Oru vetkam Varudhey lyrics pasanga song lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Â Oru Vetkam varudhey
Movie:Pasanga,
Lyrics:Thamarai,
Singer:Shreya Goshal, Naresh Iyer

Oru Vetkam Varudhey Varudhey
Siru Achcham Tharudhey Tharudhey
Manam Indru Alaipayudhey
Idhu Enna Mudhala Mudiva
Ini Endhan Uyirum Unadha
Pudhu Inbam Thaalattudhey

Poga Solli Kaalgal Thallum
Nirka Solli Nenjam Killum
Idhu Mudhal Anubavame
Ini Idhu Thodarndhidume
Idhu Tharum Tharum Thadumatram Sugam

Indru Varuma Varuma
Kulir Konjam Tharuma Tharuma
Kanavennai Kalavadudhey

Idhu Enna Mudhala Mudiva
Ini Endhan Uyirum Unadha
Pudhu Inbam Thaalattudhey

Kettu Vaangi Kollum Thunbam
Kooru Pottu Kollum Inbam
Para Para Paravenave
Thudi Thudithidum Maname
Vara Vara Vara Karai Thaandidumey

Sila Murai Un Kurumbile Naane Thorkiren
Un Madiyile En Thalaianai Virumbaal Uranguven

m: Paadhi Manadhirkul Un Penmai Irukkiradhey
thoonga Vaithidave Nenjam Thudikkiradhey

Oru Vari Nee Solla
Oru Vari Naan Solla
Ezhudidum Kaadhal Kaaviyam
Anaivarum Ketkum Naal Varum

Mazhai Indru Varuma Varuma
Kulir Konjam Tharuma Tharuma
Kanavennai Kalavadudhey

Enna Mudhala Mudiva
Ini Endhan Uyirum Unadha
Pudhu Inbam Thaalattudhey

oh Kettu Vaangi Kollum Thunbam
Kooru Pottu Kollum Inbam

Mudhal Anubavame
Ini Idhu Thodarndhidume

Vara Vara Karai Thaandidume
ah ah Kaatril Kalandhu Nee En Mugathile Yengo Modhinaai
Poo Marangalil Nee Iruppadhaal En mel Udhirgiraai

Anuppidave Neram Enakkillaiye
Ninaitha Pozhudhinile Varanum Edhiriniley

Un Kolam
Idhu Varai Naam Ponom
Nighalgiradhey Kaar Kaalamey
Nanaigiradhey Un Maarboramey

Vetkam Varudhey Varudhey
Siru Achcham Tharudhey Tharudhey
Manam Indru Alaipayudhey

Idhu Enna Mudhala Mudiva
Ini Endhan Uyirum Unadha
Pudhu Inbam Thaalattudhey
oh Poga Solli Kaalgal Thallum
Solli Nenjam Killum
Mudhal Anubavamey

Thudithidum Maname
Vara Vara Vara Karai Thaandidumey
